attributes.action: Stand up for our British way of life as the Australians do
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Australian PM has issued a strong warning to Australian Muslims welcoming them to Australia IF they adapt to Australian ways, customs and laws.This means NO Sharia Law,accept and respect the Christian faith,speak English, live in peace and freedom. If  immigrants are not happy with this then they are free to leave and return to the country of their beliefs.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
